# propertyItemAccessibilityDescription

**Type Property**

The menu item’s accessibility description.

## Declaration

```swift
static var propertyItemAccessibilityDescription: NSMenu.Properties { get }
```

## Constants

- **propertyItemTitle**: The menu item’s title.
- **propertyItemAttributedTitle**: The menu item’s attributed string title.
- **propertyItemKeyEquivalent**: The menu item’s key equivalent.
- **propertyItemImage**: The menu image.
- **propertyItemEnabled**: Whether the menu item is enabled or disabled.

items.description: The menu item’s attributed string title.
items.name: propertyItemAttributedTitle

items.description: Whether the menu item is enabled or disabled.
items.name: propertyItemEnabled

title: propertyItemAccessibilityDescription
